title: BAClib Type Traits
description: Defines the characteristics and constraints of a BACnet data type. Traits include the base type, array/series information, and type-specific properties like enumerated values, bitstring elements, struct fields, or choice options.

base.description: The name of a type which is the base for this definition.

series.description: Indicates if this is an array or list. If absent, it should be interpreted as false.
